channel.title: [Delta] Staff Online

item.title: [Delta] Staff Online
item.dc:creator: @Ambition_Rsps Ambition Rsps
item.description:
@Ambition_Rsps wrote:

I am not understanding what you are trying to say here, if you could explain a little better that would be nice, but if you are trying to make an image show or something of the sort, try making the name of the interface an actual name such as (staffinterface) or make it a shorter number because that number could be connected to something els in the server.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Staff Online
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

I made my own interface to show the staff online for players to see but I don’t know what the number/code is to show the staff names online. My interface number is 14000. I have this when you click the staff online button, [code] case 76050:
c.clearQuestInterface();
for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { {
if(server.playerHandler.players[i].playerRights >= 1){
admincounto++;
c.sendQuest("@whi@Staff Online: “+PlayerHandler.getAdminCount(), 14003);
c.sendQuest(”@red@"+server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName, 14004+admincounto);

				c.showInterface(14000);

				c.flushOutStream();

admincounto = 0;
}}
}
}[/code]

I put 14004 but it doesn’t work.
[i]c.sendQuest("@red@"+server.playerHandler.players.playerName, 14004+admincounto); this is my problem, can anyone help?

Read full topic
